## Variables

Version information. These will be filled in by the compiler.

```go
var (
    Version = "local"
    Commit  = ""
    Branch  = ""
    BuiltAt = ""
    Builder = ""
)
```

## type [Info](<https://github.com/toozej/golang-starter/blob/main/package/pkg/version/version.go#L20-L24>)

Info holds build information

```go
type Info struct {
    Commit  string
    Version string
    BuiltAt string
}
```
